lead_paragraph: T.J. Oshie completed a hat-trick when he scored the game-winning goal at 9:33 of overtime and the Washington Capitals defeated the Pittsburgh Penguins 4-3 in Game 1 of their Eastern Conference semi-final series.

headline.print_headline: Oshie Completes Hat-Trick in OT as Caps Beat Pens
headline.main: Oshie Completes Hat-Trick in OT as Caps Beat Pens

snippet: T.J. Oshie completed a hat-trick when he scored the game-winning goal at 9:33 of overtime and the Washington Capitals defeated the Pittsburgh Penguins 4-3 in Game 1 of their Eastern Conference semi-final series....
